mapper.select: select studio_no as studioNo, code, studio_name as studioName, studio_tel as studioTel, studio_loc as studioLoc, studio_addr as studioAddr, studio_price as studioPrice, studio_filename as studioFilename, studio_filepath as studioFilepath, status, viewstatus, studio_tag as studioTag, studio_latitude as studioLatitude, studio_longitud as studioLongitud from studio where status=1 and viewstatus=0

select studio_no as studioNo, code, studio_name as studioName, studio_tel as studioTel, studio_loc as studioLoc, studio_addr as studioAddr, studio_price as studioPrice, studio_filename as studioFilename, studio_filepath as studioFilepath, status, viewstatus, studio_tag as studioTag, studio_latitude as studioLatitude, studio_longitud as studioLongitud from (select rownum as rnum, s.* from (select * from studio where status=1 and viewstatus=0 order by studio_no) s) where (rnum between #{start} and #{end}) order by rnum desc
